title: OCE has no normal draft. New Champ Select stated that it will come to normal draft first.
body: Riot said that the new champ select we are getting is coming to normal draft first. The thing is OCE has no normal draft. What happens now?

replies.body: The new champion select will be tested on OCE just like the other regions, so we will essentially have normal draft available at least during this testing phase.
Thanks. Do you know what patch the champ select will be?

Hey Pandoria,

I don't believe the team has settled and/or announced the patch it's going to be released on; however, I'm guessing that it'll be sometime in December so that there's enough time to test in December and January before it's rolled out to ranked in late-January.
